meanings.definition: The art or practice of designing or making costumes.
meanings.sent1: She studied costumery to learn how to create beautiful outfits.
meanings.sent2: The theater production had a team dedicated to costumery.
meanings.sent3: The costumery class was full of colorful fabrics and sewing machines.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for costumery transformed the actors into characters.
meanings.sent5: The magic of costumery brought the fairy tale to life on stage.

meanings.definition: The costumes used in a particular production or event.
meanings.sent1: The costumery for the play included elaborate dresses and suits.
meanings.sent2: The costumery department worked tirelessly to outfit the cast.
meanings.sent3: The costumery shop was filled with racks of clothing waiting to be worn.
meanings.sent4: The costumery of the movie perfectly captured the era it was set in.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant costumery added flair to the carnival parade.
